yo insert hook into stitch yo & pull up a loop yo pull through all 3 loops on hook  double_crochet double_crochet - yo insert hook into stitch yo & pull up a loop yo pull through 2 loops yo pull through remaining 2 loops on hook color pattern sequences color pattern a color pattern b color pattern c r1 - a shorthand way to indicate a specific row/round  yo yarn over - wrap or lay yarn over hook  beg beginning - the first st or other indicated space of the row/round  repeat repeat - repeat the instructions starting at the asterisk *  skip skip - leave the indicated st unworked  same same st - the same st as the join at the base
